Module jBomberman
Package model

Class Prop

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.Figure
model.Prop
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bomb, DecoratorProp, Fire, Obstacle, PowerUp, Wall
public abstract class Prop extends Figure
They are the objects use to be bundle to Tesserae. They cannot exist out of Tesserae. In fact, these objects occupy the game grid as if they were props (Prop stands for TheatricalProperty).

    • trespasser

      public void trespasser(LevelAbstract level)
      This method will be override if the object wants to do something before its destruction. It is a point of access to make something happen before this object gets destroyed generally it's important that a subtype of Prop (after doing its stuffs) concludes its override with the super in here. This super is required to effectively set to be fired the object if there isn't a specific mechanics doing this.
      Parameters:
      level - The level in which set to be fired this
